mapper.select: SELECT CART_NO, ITEM_NO, CART_COUNT, (CAR_NAME) ITEM_NAME, (CAR_RENT_PRICE)PRICE, CATEGORY_CODE FROM "CART" JOIN "ITEM" USING (ITEM_NO) JOIN "CAR" USING (ITEM_NO) WHERE SALE_TYPE = 1 AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CATEGORY_CODE = 1 ORDER BY 2

SELECT CART_NO, ITEM_NO, CART_COUNT, (EQUIPMENT_NAME) ITEM_NAME, (EQUIPMENT_RENT_PRICE)PRICE, CATEGORY_CODE FROM "CART" JOIN "ITEM" USING (ITEM_NO) JOIN "CAMP_EQUIPMENT" USING (ITEM_NO) WHERE SALE_TYPE = 1 AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CATEGORY_CODE = 2 ORDER BY 2

SELECT CART_NO, (PACKAGE_NO) ITEM_NO, CART_COUNT, (PACKAGE_NAME) ITEM_NAME, (PACKAGE_PRICE)PRICE, CATEGORY_CODE FROM "CART" JOIN "PACKAGE" ON (PACKAGE_NO = ITEM_NO) JOIN "ITEM" USING(ITEM_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND SALE_TYPE = 1 AND CATEGORY_CODE = 3 ORDER BY 2

SELECT CART_NO, ITEM_NO, CART_COUNT, (EQUIPMENT_NAME) ITEM_NAME, (EQUIPMENT_SELL_PRICE)PRICE, CATEGORY_CODE FROM "CART" JOIN "ITEM" USING (ITEM_NO) JOIN "CAMP_EQUIPMENT" USING (ITEM_NO) WHERE SALE_TYPE = 2 AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND CATEGORY_CODE = 2
